[
    Expression(
        SemicolonTerminated {
            inner: MethodClosureCreation {
                target: Variable(
                    SimpleVariable(
                        SimpleVariable {
                            span: Span(
                                1,
                                7,
                            ),
                            name: "this",
                        },
                    ),
                ),
                span: Span(
                    1,
                    12,
                ),
                method: Identifier(
                    SimpleIdentifier(
                        SimpleIdentifier {
                            span: Span(
                                1,
                                14,
                            ),
                            value: "foo",
                        },
                    ),
                ),
                placeholder: ArgumentPlaceholder {
                    comments: CommentGroup {
                        comments: [],
                    },
                    start: Span(
                        1,
                        17,
                    ),
                    ellipsis: Span(
                        1,
                        18,
                    ),
                    end: Span(
                        1,
                        21,
                    ),
                },
            },
            semicolon: Span(
                1,
                22,
            ),
        },
    ),
]
